channel.title: Hashcat on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Hashcat on TLDRBins

item.title: Password Cracking
item.description: john Convert file to john hash format # For example ssh2john id_rsa_encrypted > hash keepass2john test.kdbx > hash zip2john test.zip > hash # Get a full list of *2john find / -name *2john 2>/dev/null Basic # General use john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt hash # Specify hash format john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt hash --format=Raw-SHA512 # Show cracked hash john --show hash # Show cracked hash with specific format john --show hash --format=Raw-SHA512 hashcat Example Hashes

item.title: Shadow Hash Cracking
item.description: Shadow Hash Cracking # Prepare an unshadowed hashes file unshadow passwd.txt shadow.txt > unshadowed.txt john john --wordlist=/usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt unshadowed.txt hashcat hashcat -m 7400 unshadowed.txt /usr/share/wordlists/rockyou.txt --force --user
